org.dalesbred.instantiation

Interface InstantiatorRegistry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultInstantiatorRegistry

    public interface InstantiatorRegistry
    Provides access to the publicly available configuration interface of DefaultInstantiatorRegistry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInstantiationListener(InstantiationListener instantiationListener)
      Adds a new InstantiationListener, which gets notified whenever one of the instantiators creates an object.
      <T> void registerInstantiator(Class<T> cl, Instantiator<T> instantiator)
      Registers an instantiator to be used when instances of cl are required.
